alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Pike (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 7:45PM EDT until July 01 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Gibson County in southwestern Indiana... Pike County in southwestern Indiana... * Until 730 PM CDT/830 PM EDT/. * At 645 PM CDT/745 PM EDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Patoka, or near Princeton, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Princeton, Petersburg, Winslow, Patoka and Hazleton. This includes Interstate 69 in Indiana between Mile Markers 37 and 52. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
